Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool CanValidateTokenCore(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken token) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the specified security token can be validated by this security token authenticator.
Docs.returns: when is a security token; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<class System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> ValidateTokenCore(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken token) cil managed

Docs.summary: Authenticates the specified security token and returns the set of authorization policies for the security token.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of type that contains the set of authorization policies in effect for this application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> method is called on the authorization policy that is returned from this method, a claim of type <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes.Rsa%2A> is added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.ClaimSets%2A> property of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext> that is passed into the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> method.
